contentrichtext.text: '''FAI''', used as an [[acronym]], may refer to: == Organizations == * [[Fatal accident inquiry]], a Scottish legal aspect, used when a fatal accident has occurred. * [[Federación Anarquista Ibérica]], "Iberian Anarchist Federation" * [[Fédération Aéronautique Internationale]], "FAI - The World Air Sports Federation" * [[Federazione Anarchica Informale]] (Informal Anarchist Federation), Italian organization of direct action anarchist factions * [[Federazione Anarchica Italiana]] (Italian Anarchist Federation), founded in 1945 in Carrara * [[Fondo per l'Ambiente Italiano]], "Italian Environment Fund" * [[Football Association of Ireland]], for football (soccer) in the Republic of Ireland. * [[Food Allergy Initiative]], a US based non-profit organization which funds research and seeks a cure for food allergies * [[Food Animal Initiative]], [[Oxford]] based, global, sustainable farming research and development organisation * ''Fournisseur d'accès à Internet'', French term for [[Internet service provider]], an organization that sells access to the Internet * [[Broad Left Front (Peru)|Frente Amplio de Izquierda]], Broad Left Front, a political coalition in Peru == Others == * [[FAI armoured car]], a Soviet military vehicle of the early 1930s * [[FAI Films]], a defunct Australian film production company * [[Fairbanks International Airport]] (IATA code 'FAI'), a public airport near the city of Fairbanks, Alaska, United States * [[Femoral Acetabular Impingement]], a condition affecting the hip joint. * [[Financial Access Initiative]], a research consortium * [[First article inspection]] * [[Fixed asset]] investment * [[Free Androgen Index]] * [[Friendly artificial intelligence]] * [[HVAC#Major terms|Fresh air intake]], in HVAC systems, an opening through which outside air is drawn into a building. * [[Fully Automatic Installation]], for non-interactive installation of the Debian GNU/Linux operating system * [[Free Androgen Index]] '''Fai''' may refer to: * [[Sonny Fai]], New Zealand rugby league player * [[Fay D. Flourite]] (misnamed 'Fai' in some versions), a character from ''Tsubasa: RESERVoir CHRoNiCLE'' {{disambiguation}}
